statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); VERSION=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".version"); NODE_VER=$(node --version 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A"); echo "[$MODEL] 📁 ${DIR##*/} | Node $NODE_VER | Claude $VERSION"'

bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); COLORS=("🔴" "🟠" "🟡" "🟢" "🔵" "🟣"); COLOR_INDEX=$(($(date +%S) % 6)); COLOR=${COLORS[$COLOR_INDEX]}; RAINBOW="🌈"; HOUR=$(date +%H); ENERGY=$([ $HOUR -lt 12 ] && echo "☀️ Morning" || [ $HOUR -lt 18 ] && echo "🌤️ Afternoon" || echo "🌙 Evening"); STREAK=$(($(date +%j) % 100)); echo "[$MODEL] $RAINBOW $COLOR $ENERGY | ⚡Streak: $STREAK | 📁 ${DIR##*/}"'
